author: Alessandra Foresto
title: Your Heart Is Not Ready For Jennifer Lopez's People's Choice Awards Hot AF Appearance
text:
Jennifer Lopez at the 2017   Your Heart Is Not Ready For Jennifer Lopez's   Hot AF Appearance January 18, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Your Heart Is Not Ready For Jennifer Lopez's   Hot AF Appearance 
Jennifer Lopez would be the one responsible for leaving the naked dress behind and introducing the world to the half-naked gown. The Shades of Blue star and World of Dance judge stepped on the red carpet for the 2017   in Los Angeles wearing a skintight black Reem Acra long-sleeved mermaid gown with a totally see-through bodice that showed off her beige bra under silver jewels. And we really only have two words in response to her look: holy sh*t! 
J Lo looked beyond hot even if she didn't maker her red carpet debut with rumored new boyfriend Drake . That perfect ponytail, the smoky eye shadow, the sexy curves — there's nothing wrong about this entire look, and to top it all off, Jennifer took the award for best favorite crime drama TV actress! Keep reading to see her hot look from up close. Related:
